definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_ticks</field><next><block type="world_entity_inrange_foreach"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="range"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">20</field></block></value><value name="_placeholder"><block type="entity_iterator"></block></value><statement name="foreach"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="text_binary_ops"><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:animation</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">none</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="play_animation"><field name="active">&& !animation.isActive()</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_iterator"></block></value><value name="animation"><block type="variables_get_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:animation</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement><next><block type="variables_set_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:animation</field><value name="VAL"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">none</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
